get.description: List all todo projects the user owns or collaborates on.

get.description: Get a specific todo project if the user has access.

put.description: Update a todo project if the user has access and it's not a General project.

delete.description: Delete a todo project if the user is the owner and it's not a General project.

get.description: Retrieve todo items from projects the user has access to.

schema.description: Field to sort by: id, name, created_at, updated_at, is_closed, completed_at

delete.description: Delete a todo item if the user has access to its project.

- Current token statistics
